A little over a week ago I decided to update my Java TDD course.
I wanted t=
o add a section that describes BDD or possibly even
write a new course that=
 teaches BDD.  As I was working on the
examples to be used for the course I=
 noticed that it felt odd 
to mark my unit level specs with @Test.  I forke=
d the junit code 
in github and added the ability to mark them using a new =
@Spec
annotation.  It behaves identically to @Test.  I have sent a pull
req=
uest to Kent but I am curious what this list thinks about this
change.

Tha=
nks
-Cheezy
